checks.msg: AppArmor is disabled. The apparmor annotation should be set to 'runtime/default' or start with 'localhost/'.
Capability Drop list should be set to ALL. Add the specific ones you need to the Add list and set an override label.

Capability "AUDIT_CONTROL" added. It should be removed from the capability add list. If you need this capability, add an override label such as 'container.kubeaudit.io/enforcer.allow-capability-audit-control: SomeReason'.

Capability "IPC_LOCK" added. It should be removed from the capability add list. If you need this capability, add an override label such as 'container.kubeaudit.io/enforcer.allow-capability-ipc-lock: SomeReason'.

Capability "KILL" added. It should be removed from the capability add list. If you need this capability, add an override label such as 'container.kubeaudit.io/enforcer.allow-capability-kill: SomeReason'.

Capability "MKNOD" added. It should be removed from the capability add list. If you need this capability, add an override label such as 'container.kubeaudit.io/enforcer.allow-capability-mknod: SomeReason'.

Capability "NET_ADMIN" added. It should be removed from the capability add list. If you need this capability, add an override label such as 'container.kubeaudit.io/enforcer.allow-capability-net-admin: SomeReason'.

Capability "NET_RAW" added. It should be removed from the capability add list. If you need this capability, add an override label such as 'container.kubeaudit.io/enforcer.allow-capability-net-raw: SomeReason'.

Capability "SETGID" added. It should be removed from the capability add list. If you need this capability, add an override label such as 'container.kubeaudit.io/enforcer.allow-capability-setgid: SomeReason'.

Capability "SETUID" added. It should be removed from the capability add list. If you need this capability, add an override label such as 'container.kubeaudit.io/enforcer.allow-capability-setuid: SomeReason'.

Capability "SYSLOG" added. It should be removed from the capability add list. If you need this capability, add an override label such as 'container.kubeaudit.io/enforcer.allow-capability-syslog: SomeReason'.

Capability "SYS_ADMIN" added. It should be removed from the capability add list. If you need this capability, add an override label such as 'container.kubeaudit.io/enforcer.allow-capability-sys-admin: SomeReason'.

Capability "SYS_CHROOT" added. It should be removed from the capability add list. If you need this capability, add an override label such as 'container.kubeaudit.io/enforcer.allow-capability-sys-chroot: SomeReason'.

Capability "SYS_MODULE" added. It should be removed from the capability add list. If you need this capability, add an override label such as 'container.kubeaudit.io/enforcer.allow-capability-sys-module: SomeReason'.

Capability "SYS_PTRACE" added. It should be removed from the capability add list. If you need this capability, add an override label such as 'container.kubeaudit.io/enforcer.allow-capability-sys-ptrace: SomeReason'.

Capability "SYS_RESOURCE" added. It should be removed from the capability add list. If you need this capability, add an override label such as 'container.kubeaudit.io/enforcer.allow-capability-sys-resource: SomeReason'.
hostPID is set to 'true' in PodSpec. It should be set to 'false'.
Sensitive path mounted as volume: proc (hostPath: /proc). It should be removed from the container's mounts list.
Sensitive path mounted as volume: etc (hostPath: /etc). It should be removed from the container's mounts list.
runAsNonRoot should be set to true or runAsUser should be set to a value > 0 either in the container SecurityContext or PodSecurityContext.
allowPrivilegeEscalation not set which allows privilege escalation. It should be set to 'false'.
readOnlyRootFilesystem is not set in container SecurityContext. It should be set to 'true'.
Pod Seccomp profile is missing. Seccomp profile should be added to the pod SecurityContext.
